'SHARE', is a charitable organization which seeks to provide a literary
environment to educate girls in East Africa. [http://www.shareinafrica.org
SHARE Mission Statement] SHARE, an acronym for SHannonâs After-school
Reading Exchange, is a non-profit incorporated in the state of New Jersey. SHARE
was founded in 2008 by Shannon McNamara, who created the first SHARE room in the
Kiteyagwa Primary School in Bukoba, Tanzania for her Girl Scout Gold Award Proj-
ect. http://www.mycentraljersey.com/article/20100307/GETPUBLISHED/3070324/H-
eart-of-New-Jersey-Girl-Scout-Awarded-Girl-Scouts-USA-National-Young-Women

Girls who attend primary school in Tanzania struggle to become literate. They
are expected to perform household chores, such as gathering firewood, hauling
water, cooking, caring for siblings, and farming, instead of pursuing their stu-
dies. [http://www.teenvoices.com/issue_current/articles/apr_09_activist_mon-
th.htm âShannon McNamara Started Her Own Reading Programâ¦in Africa!â]
SHARE addresses this problem by establishing after-school reading programs. [http://www.app.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/CN/20090122/EDUCATION/901220322-
&template=printart âBernards reading exchange program sending books to
Tanzaniaâ] SHARE rooms are designed to increase reading and English
language skills, with additional programs in health, nutrition, and recreation.

SHARE has raised $81,000 in its efforts to increase literacy for African girls.
With these funds, SHARE has created three SHARE branches for 150 Tanzanian
girls, ages 10 â17. SHARE has collected 22,000 donated items, including
childrenâs books, school supplies, computer software games, and lap top
computers, which have been shipped to the SHARE branches in Bukoba, Tanzania. [http://oprahsangelnetwork.org/stories/545-sharing-a-vision-for-
girls "Sharing a Vision for Girls". Oprah's Angel Network.] Most recently,
SHARE has expanded into the Kagemo Secondary School and the Kangabusharo Primary
School, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FEd0rcBMCPU located in rural
villages in the Kagondo region of Tanzania. SHAREâs newest initiative is to
bring electricity to the schools. http://www.youtube.com/user/shareinafrica-
#p/a/f/0/H38ZhbPBoJk

SHARE is headquartered in Basking Ridge, New Jersey in the United States.
